instructions: Navigate to File > Open and select a file/directory to begin. Select a file (SWF or ZIP) if you would like to curate a game. Select a directory if you would like AutoFPCurator to
iterateThrough: iterate through every Flash game in the folder.
notice: This tool is only designed FOR SINGLE ASSET GAMES that work in the Flash projector OR in a standard HTML embed. Otherwise, please use Flashpoint Core.
